name: Dagger of Darkness
description:
Dagger of Darkness is a third person action game, featuring a fluid close range combat system.

Defeat as many foes as you can, before you meet your untimely demise.

Controls:

Hold and Drag - Basic movement
Swipe - Dodge/Dash
Tap - Attack

Tap during a dodge to perform a quick attack afterwards.
Connect different moves to confuse your enemy.
